mapper.update:
update account
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_type = #{accountType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
roles = #{roles,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
last_editor = #{lastEditor,jdbcType=BIGINT},
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update account set account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_type = #{accountType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, roles = #{roles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, last_editor = #{lastEditor,jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from account where account=#{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
